channel.title: [help] animate a sword for combat [help]
channel.description:
Well the models i have made work fine in a private server. but when i tried to attack something the sword dissapeared and it was just my fist punching the monster. then after i was done attacking the monster the sword was back in my hand. can some show me or lead me to a tutorial explaining how to animate wepons for combat?
thanks

item.title: [help] animate a sword for combat [help]
item.dc:creator: @skittle385 skittle385
item.description:
@skittle385 wrote:

yeah, u gotta add it in the client.java folder thing…first find out what u want the attack to look like(i meen like what weapon) like the dds attack when he lunges in…just go into client.java and search 5698 or whatever the dds ID is and then copy and paste the voids with the dds but rename the DDSSpecial to like whatver urs is gunna be so like a hippy godsword… HGSSpecial and change the item id to the weapon, if u need a full explination just pm me

Read full topic
